channel.title: BMS Mapping Ideas
channel.description: So I made an unnamed map called Arena. It's basically a big building built into a wall, and a huge area for whatever I want (npc wars). So now im thinking I could turn it into a multiplayer map in the future, if the game is ever updated with multiplayer deathmatch. But now im thinking I'll just make an entirely different map, because my first one would be kind of buggy anyways; it was designed just for singeplayer. All the rooms are so small. So does anyone have any ideas on multiplayer maps? Also, if you want to download the singleplayer map, here's the, -----> [url='https://www.mediafire.com/download.php?yf0zpivc26nd82h'].BSP[/url] and the ----->[url='https://www.mediafire.com/download.php?8zxpcb0c4z00510'].VMF[/url]

The submission rules may change. It’s possible they will accept multiplayer maps for inclusion with DM, but who knows.

item.title: BMS Mapping Ideas
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Only moderators can delete threads.
But yes, as Heisenberg said keep at it. Looking back they came off a tad too harsh.

Read full topic

item.title: BMS Mapping Ideas
item.dc:creator: MasterOfCrOcKeTs
item.description:
They’re not accepting maps, and honestly this one isn’t all that interesting.

I see…now I have to figure out how to undo this thread I guess. This map isn’t really worth showing off though, it only took me one evening to make it. At least if I ever need a blank level for testing out the hammer editor, i’ll have this one available. It’s all nice and homey.

Read full topic

item.title: BMS Mapping Ideas
item.dc:creator: Heisenberg
item.description:
Dont quit making maps try and keep getting better and in this forum there is a Show Off Thread that would be much more suited to your mapping. But there is no way of implementing your map into Black Mesa. But people may be interested in seeing your work just not for the mod!

Read full topic

item.title: BMS Mapping Ideas
item.dc:creator: MasterOfCrOcKeTs
item.description:
So I made an unnamed map called Arena. It’s basically a big building built into a wall, and a huge area for whatever I want (npc wars). So now im thinking I could turn it into a multiplayer map in the future, if the game is ever updated with multiplayer deathmatch. But now im thinking I’ll just make an entirely different map, because my first one would be kind of buggy anyways; it was designed just for singeplayer. All the rooms are so small. So does anyone have any ideas on multiplayer maps? Also, if you want to download the singleplayer map, here’s the, -----> .BSP and the ----->.VMF
